body.name: Tommee Tippee Breast-Like Pacifier Night, Glow in The Dark, Skin-Like Texture, Symmetrical Design, BPA-Free Binkies, 6-18m, 4-Count, Blue/Yellow
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 15 mins
features: Breast-like: Inspired by our award-winning closer to nature nipple, this soft silicone nipple flexes and stretches just like mom, providing breast-like comfort for the most natural soothing experience
Helps with transition: A reassuring alternative to traditional pacifiers, this one feels, flexes and stretches just like skin for less chance of confusion when feeding your baby from breast or bottle
Symmetrical design: Our breast-like pacifier features a symmetrical silicone nipple and with no ‘wrong’ side up, it will always be placed correctly in baby’s mouth
Kind on baby’s skin: This unique pacifier shield curves away from baby’s face and offers superior ventilation for better air flow to reduce moisture build-up and help prevent irritation
Glows in the dark: The pacifier shield will recharge in natural light and will glow in the dark for up to 8 hours so you can locate the pacifier in a dark room without having to disturb baby
body.description: The instinctive action of sucking helps to calm and soothe babies and all parents know there’s nothing more wonderful than a calm, content baby. When mom’s breast isn’t available, our Breast-like pacifier is the next best thing for baby to latch onto in between feeds. This pacifier glows in the dark for up to 8 hours which allows parents to locate the pacifier in a dark room without having to disturb baby. During the day your pacifier will recharge in natural light. Inspired by our award-winning Closer to Nature® nipple, this super soft silicone pacifier feels, moves, flexes and stretches just like skin so there’s less chance of confusion when feeding baby from breast or bottle - perfect if you’re worried that offering your baby a pacifier may disrupt breast or bottle feeding. As the symmetrical silicone baglet is fully reversible, there is no ‘wrong’ side-up so the pacifier will always be placed correctly in your baby’s mouth, even when they put it in their mouth themselves. The pacifier shield curves away from baby’s face and offers superior ventilation and extra air flow and prevent the build-up of moisture which helps to protect baby’s delicate skin against irritation. We recommend that you replace the pacifier every month and always at the first signs of damage or weakness. We recommend against prolonged pacifier use over 24 months and stopping pacifier use when your child is older than 36 months.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Natural soothing experience Babies will naturally look to mom for comfort. When mom’s breast isn’t available, the Tommee Tippee Breast-like pacifier is the next best thing for baby to latch onto in between feeds.Taking inspiration from Mother Nature and our award-winning Closer to Nature nipple, this super soft silicone pacifier feels, moves, flexes and stretches just like skin so there’s less chance of confusion when feeding baby from breast or bottle - Perfect if you’re worried that offering your baby a pacifier may disrupt breast or bottle feeding.

Symmetrical design The symmetrical, soft silicone baglet is fully reversible and has no ‘wrong-side-up’ so the pacifier will always be placed correctly in your baby’s mouth, even when baby puts the pacifier in their mouth themselves. Kind to baby’s skin Sucking and dribbling can sometimes mean baby’s skin becomes irritated around the mouth. The Tommee Tippee Breast-like pacifier curves away from baby’s face and offers superior ventilation to increase airflow and prevent rashes. Glow in the dark The Breast-like pacifier Night glows in the dark for up to 8 hours, so when your baby launches it from their cot in the middle of the night, it’s really easy to spot! During the day your pacifier will recharge in natural light, the more light the longer the glow, it’s as easy as that.

Available in different age stages The Breast-like pacifier is suitable for use from birth and is available in two age stages. The 0-6-month size features a smaller nipple and shield for tiny mouths and noses. As your baby grows, you can switch to the 6-18m pacifier which offers the same benefits but with a larger nipple and shield. Easy to clean & BPA-free Silicone is taste-free and won’t retain any stains or odors. Easy to clean either in a sterilizer, by hand or in the top rack of the dishwasher. Always BPA and phthalate-free for your ultimate reassurance. How often should I replace my baby’s pacifier? In the interests of hygiene, we recommend that you change your baby’s pacifier every month. Always check the pacifier before each use and replace at the first signs of damage or weakness. We recommend against prolonged pacifier use over 24 months and stopping pacifier use when your child is older than 36 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these pacifiers! They glow in the dark which is great at bedtime when I need to find it in my sons crib. The quality of them is really good and they're very easy to clean. Tommee Tippee pacifiers have been my sons favorite and I have them in so many colors now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves them
reviews.reviewText: Loved these pacifiers for our baby, we tried several and only this type worked for her. Something us as parents loved was how they glow in the dark so it was super easy to find them them during night time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are silly looking binkies and a lot of the time people think my kid is sucking on a bottle lid- but HEY, these might be some of the best binkies for two reasons. One, they glow in the dark so my tot can easily find at night- I keep all 4 in the crib so it’s never a problem. And two, these are the only binkies my guy hasn’t been able to chew holes in! Bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only pacifier my baby will take. I love that they glow in the dark, makes it easy to find without having to turn on the light in the middle of the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We only trust this brand
reviews.reviewText: My kid won’t do any other Bobo’s than these.Nice that they glow in the dark too.We love this brand for bottles as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing quality and fast shipping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My god daughter cant live with out this ,its easy to clean, child friendly and i just love it highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are my son's favorite bink but no store carries them in the 6m to 18m size so we ordered them. We love glow in dark feature. One negative I have is if they get dirty it can be pain to clean inside the circle plastic space between the rubber and plastic.

reviews.reviewTitle: The only soother my son would take
reviews.reviewText: These soothers were a life saver! On the odd occasion our son is fussy these do the trick. The glow in dark is handy when you’re driving at night or trying to find it.
Me gustaría saber si cambiaron la consistencia del producto. Pero en general todo muy bien

My LO loves these pacifiers. So I wanted to buy the larger size as bubs has now out grown the other ones. I didn't realize that these glow in the dark when I bought them. I get the reason behind it, so you can easily find it in the dark. However, the glow is so bright it can be seen through the eye lids and it disrupts my baby. I took off 1 star for that.

J'ai longtemps été embêté car je cherchais des tétines légères et larges car mon petit bout à la facheuse habitude de rentrer les tétines entière dans sa bouche... Problème résolu grâce à ces tétine, et en plus elle brille dans le noir ce qui permet de rapidement les retrouver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have twin boys who wouldnt take most of the other highly recommended branded dummies we have tries them with, these were are final attempt in trying to get them to take a dummy and they both took to them immediately! They have had numerous of these dummies and we started with 0-12 sized ones at first but changed to this size as they got older and we have had no issues with both sizes! The glow in the dark makes the nighttime dummy hunt much more efficient as they illuminate really well and makes it easier to find in the middle of the night! I just wished they sold these in more places and we had knew about them earlier!
